name: df-ae
body: |- wceq(cae, copab(s0, s1, wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(s1))), cv(s0))), nat0)))
comment: Define 'almost everywhere' with regard to a measure ` M ` . A property holds almost everywhere if the measure of the set where it does not hold has measure zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)
